meanings.definition: To imagine or visualize something in the future.
meanings.sent1: She envisions a world where everyone is kind to each other.
meanings.sent2: He often envisions his dream house with a big garden.
meanings.sent3: The cat envisions a world where all boxes are open for exploration.
meanings.sent4: The artist envisions a masterpiece that will leave viewers in awe.
meanings.sent5: The child envisions a magical land where animals can talk and trees can dance.

meanings.definition: To have a mental image or idea of something.
meanings.sent1: The author envisions the protagonist as a brave warrior on a quest.
meanings.sent2: She envisions a peaceful scene with birds chirping and flowers blooming.
meanings.sent3: The robot envisions a world where all tasks are done with efficiency.
meanings.sent4: The scientist envisions a breakthrough that will change the course of history.
meanings.sent5: The student envisions success as reaching the top of the mountain of knowledge.
